description:
- Old-Fashioned Beret "A recreation of the felt hat that was used when carrying out agricultural work in the olden days."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
 - Academy Mage Wear: Lavender "Uniform-style clothing with a design inspired by the Magic Academy in Gavamekia."
 - Kid's Mage Wear: Lavender "Uniform-style children's clothing with a design inspired by the Magic Academy in Gavamekia."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Academy Mage Wear Set: Lavender
